explains: vi. [计] 重新启动；重新开始
vt. [计] 重新启动；重新开始

sentences.en: The doctors struggled to restart his heart.
sentences.cn: 医生竭力重新起搏他的心脏。

sentences.en: The trial will restart today with a new jury.
sentences.cn: 今天审讯会重新开始，一个新的陪审团会出庭。

sentences.en: The commissioners agreed to restart talks as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 这些委员们同意尽快重新开始会谈。
